column9: and five-spice powder together in a large resealable plastic bag.

column2: pressing out as much air as possible.

column1: Place bag on a plate and marinate pork belly in the refrigerator
Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C) with a rack in the upper third of the oven. Set a wire rack on a rimmed baking sheet.
Place pork belly on the wire rack
Bake pork belly in the preheated oven until the internal temperature reaches 160 degrees F (71 degrees C)
Remove pork belly from the oven; baste with reserved marinade.
Move oven rack to the top position and preheat the oven's broiler.
Broil pork until it is dark and glossy and the edges start to blacken
Flip and baste on the second side. Continue broiling until second side darkens and starts to blacken
